unlocks.message:
Gems are personalized through interactions.
Let's see a few examples.
unlocks.heading: LISTENED FOR 1,000 MINUTES
unlocks.title: Streaming PRODUCT unlocks a new element for your Gem.

unlocks.message: Beyond streaming, real-world interactions are also possible, like discovering hidden objects.
unlocks.heading: FOUND A HIDDEN OBJECT
unlocks.title: The secret code on a hidden pool toy at Honest Jon's unlocks a rare element.

unlocks.message: Gems are full of surprise easter eggs. Visiting storied locations with friends might unlock a new element.
unlocks.heading: FOUND A SPECIAL LOCATION
unlocks.title: Visiting Heaven's alley with friends unlocks a surprise element for each of you.

unlocks.message:
Fans can also work together on community listening.
Only fans who owned the Gem unlock the element.
unlocks.heading: 1 MILLION COMMUNITY STREAMS
unlocks.title: Current collectors of this Gem reached 1 million minutes of shared listening.

unlocks.message: Gems reveal the story of an artist and their album in a layered, personal way.
unlocks.heading: COMPLETED ALL UNLOCKS
unlocks.title: And by unlocking new elements, each Gem becomes progressively more unique to its collector.

unlocks.message:
Gems can take many forms.
Here's a few more.
